title: Dogecoin treasury firm CleanCore stock slides as losses mount, DOGE value drops
contentSnippet: The company said it has closed its $175 million private placement meant to fund the formation of the official DOGE treasury strategy

title: Bitcoin Dives Below $100K for Third Time This Month as Crypto Liquidations Top $500 Million
contentSnippet: Bitcoin dropped below $100,000 per coin for the third time this month as broader concerns over the U.S. economy weighed on investors.

title: OKX launches in-wallet DEX trading, tapping Base, Solana and X Layer
contentSnippet: OKX is following competitors like Coinbase by integrating DeFi trading directly into their core self-custody wallet product.

title: Solana DAT firm Upexi latest crypto treasury to launch stock buyback program
contentSnippet: Upexi's board of directors approved $50 million for an open-ended stock repurchase program, intended to boost shareholder value.

title: Stellar Tumbles Below Key $0.285 Support as Bears Take Over
contentSnippet: XLM retreated to $0.281 as selling pressure intensified during afternoon trading, with volume surging amid failed resistance test.

title: Bitcoin Crumbles Below $100K, Crypto Stocks Eviscerated as Liquidity Crunch Hammers Risk Markets

title: Canary's XRP ETF Off to Hot Start, Has 'Good Shot' of Breaking Record: Analyst

title: JPMorgan Analysts Flip Bullish on Circle, Citing Faster Stablecoin Growth

title: mXRP, a yield-bearing tokenized XRP product, expands to BNB Chain via Lista DAO

title: Bitcoin Derivatives Might Not Fully Recover From October Crash Until Q2

title: ICP Advances as Consolidation Holds Below $6.66 Resistance Price

title: Bitfarms stock tumbles as miner posts $46 million loss, plans AI/HPC pivot with Washington site
contentSnippet: Bitfarms reported revenue of $69 million, which was up 156% year over year but missed most estimates by around 15%.

title: 21Shares debuts two crypto index funds offering exposure to Bitcoin, Dogecoin and more
contentSnippet: 21Shares launched two crypto index ETFs, providing investors with exposure to Bitcoin, Solana, Ethereum and Dogecoin.

title: dYdX Governance Approves Buyback Increase to 75% of Protocol Revenue
contentSnippet: The new proposal, which 59.38% of the community approved, charts a course to raise the buy-back allocation up from 25% of net protocol fees.

title: Emory University Doubles Down on Bitcoin With $52M Grayscale BTC ETF Stake
contentSnippet: The managers of the Georgia university's endowment are showing an inclination towards hard assets, opening a sizable position in a gold ETF as well.

title: JPMorgan upgrades target for Circle shares amid new partnerships, ‘solid’ earnings
contentSnippet: Currently trading at about $85, the analysts issued a new stock price target for Circle of $100 by December 2026.

title: Cathie Wood's Ark Invest Buys $30 Million in Circle Shares Ahead of Potential Arc Token
contentSnippet: Cathie Wood's investment firm bought around $30 million worth of shares in stablecoin issuer Circle as its price continues to dip.

title: BONK Falls 3.9%, Sliding Below Support

contentSnippet: Evaluating crypto treasury companies: Are they hype or real value? Learn the key risks—premium, leverage, and regulation—advisors must consider for clients.

title: Singapore to Roll Out Stablecoin Regulations, Expand CBDC Trials
contentSnippet: Chia Der Jiun of the Monetary Authority of Singapore said that regulation is key to confidence as tokenization gains traction.

title: Leading Base DEX Aerodrome Merges Into Aero in Major Overhaul
contentSnippet: Dromos Labs announced a major overhaul of its decentralized exchange infrastructure with the launch of Aero, a unified trading system that will merge its existing platforms across its networks.

title: Czech central bank buys bitcoin for first time as part of digital asset ‘test portfolio’
contentSnippet: While not a formal bitcoin reserve shift, it's the first confirmed instance of a central bank directly buying BTC.

title: UFC Parent TKO Signs Polymarket to Exclusive Prediction Market Deal
contentSnippet: Polymarket will power official prediction markets and fan engagement features for the UFC and Zuffa Boxing, thanks to a multi-year deal.

title: JPMorgan sees bitcoin support at $94,000, keeps $170,000 upside case intact
contentSnippet: Bitcoin’s downside from current levels appears to be “very limited,” according to JPMorgan, which sees its support price at around $94,000.

title: Grayscale seeks NYSE debut in latest sign of crypto IPO momentum under Trump
contentSnippet: Grayscale Investments has filed for an IPO, reporting $35 billion in AUM and targeting a $365 billion market opportunity.

title: Thai-FBI Operation Recovers $432,000 in Crypto From Alleged European Hacker
contentSnippet: The operation, code-named "Operation 293," returned the recovered digital assets to Thai victims on Monday.
